Package model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockModelImpl, ModelImpl
    public interface Model
    This interface represents certain functions to be offered by a program that work with stocks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPortfolio​(IPortfolio portfolio)
      Adds a portfolio to the users list of portfolios
      java.lang.String formatPortfolios()
      Formats the portfolios as a string.
      ProgramFunction gainOrLossOverTime​(java.lang.String stockName, java.time.LocalDate initialDate, java.time.LocalDate finalDate)
      Allows a user to examine the gain or loss of a stock over a specified period of time.
      java.util.ArrayList<IPortfolio> getAllPortfolios()
      Used in the portfolio controller to get the portfolios of the user.
      IPortfolio getPortfolio​(java.lang.String title)
      Gets a specific portfolio given its title
      ProgramFunction movingAverage​(java.lang.String stockName, java.time.LocalDate date, int xValue)
      Allows a user to examine the x-day moving average of a stock for a specified date and a specified value of x.
      ProgramFunction portfolioOptions​(java.lang.Readable rd, StockView view)
      Allow a user to access different functions with portfolios.
      ProgramFunction xDayCrossovers​(java.lang.String stockName, java.time.LocalDate initialDate, java.time.LocalDate finalDate, int xValue)
      Allow a user to determine which days are x-day crossovers for a specified stock over a specified date range and a specified value of x.

    • Method Detail

      • gainOrLossOverTime

        ProgramFunction gainOrLossOverTime​(java.lang.String stockName,
                                   java.time.LocalDate initialDate,
                                   java.time.LocalDate finalDate)
        Allows a user to examine the gain or loss of a stock over a specified period of time.
        Parameters:
        stockName - the stock being investigated.
        initialDate - the initial date to be searched from.
        finalDate - the final date to be searched to.
        Returns:
        The function that will perform this operation.

      • movingAverage

        ProgramFunction movingAverage​(java.lang.String stockName,
                              java.time.LocalDate date,
                              int xValue)
        Allows a user to examine the x-day moving average of a stock for a specified date and a specified value of x.
        Parameters:
        stockName - the stock being investigated.
        date - the date to start the investigation on.
        xValue - the number of days before the given date to be examined.
        Returns:
        The function that will perform this operation.

      • xDayCrossovers

        ProgramFunction xDayCrossovers​(java.lang.String stockName,
                               java.time.LocalDate initialDate,
                               java.time.LocalDate finalDate,
                               int xValue)
        Allow a user to determine which days are x-day crossovers for a specified stock over a specified date range and a specified value of x.
        Parameters:
        stockName - the stock being investigated.
        initialDate - the date to start the investigation on.
        finalDate - the date to end the investigation on.
        xValue - the number of days before the given date to be examined.
        Returns:
        The function that will perform this operation.

      • portfolioOptions

        ProgramFunction portfolioOptions​(java.lang.Readable rd,
                                 StockView view)
        Allow a user to access different functions with portfolios.
        Returns:
        The function that will perform this operation.

      • getPortfolio

        IPortfolio getPortfolio​(java.lang.String title)
        Gets a specific portfolio given its title
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the portfolio to be found
        Returns:
        The portfolio with the given title.

      • getAllPortfolios

        java.util.ArrayList<IPortfolio> getAllPortfolios()
        Used in the portfolio controller to get the portfolios of the user.
        Returns:
        A List of Portfolios that the user has.

      • formatPortfolios

        java.lang.String formatPortfolios()
        Formats the portfolios as a string.
        Returns:
        The String of the returned portfolios

      • addPortfolio

        void addPortfolio​(IPortfolio portfolio)
        Adds a portfolio to the users list of portfolios
        Parameters:
        portfolio - The portfolio to be added
